description: The Alta Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Alta Ski Area for the snow report
Alexa, ask Alta Ski Area for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Alta Ski Area
shortDescription: The Alta Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Alta Ski Area.
